liquibase.Liquibase

liquibase.Liquibase Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Core LiquiBase facade.

Although there are several ways of executing LiquiBase (Ant, command line, etc.) they are all wrappers around this class.

Member Function Documentation

void liquibase.Liquibase.setCurrentDateTimeFunction ( String  currentDateTimeFunction  ) 

Use this function to override the current date/time function used to insert dates into the database.

Especially useful when using an unsupported database.

boolean liquibase.Liquibase.isSafeToRunMigration (  )  throws JDBCException

Returns true if it is "save" to migrate the database.

Currently, "safe" is defined as running in an output-sql mode or against a database on localhost. It is fine to run LiquiBase against a "non-safe" database, the method is mainly used to determine if the user should be prompted before continuing.
